name: Drupal Redesigned
description:
A userstyle for the redesigned drupal.org

Works for:
* drupal.org (http + https)
* api.drupal.org
* localize.drupal.org

Key Features:
* Fluid layout
* Usage of traditional fonts (Tahoma, etc)
* Compact layout, recovering wasted space
* Better contrast of certain areas
* Druplicon is Back!
* Ancient "Drupal" banner

Please report back anything

Updates:
2010.11.26 = Initial Release

Tested on:
* Chrome 9.0 [Linux]
* Firefox 3.6 [Linux & Windows]
